data.name: Create_Local_Login_Text
data.value: You do not have a local username/password for this site. Create a local password, so you can log in without an external login.

data.name: For_Developers_Text
data.value: Getting updates on your customers /users addresses is very easy. Once you have the GladId you can get the up-to-date address and personal data by requesting it from our RESTful API.

data.name: For_WebsiteOwners_Text
data.value:
5 good reasons to use gladdress on your website:

  1. Get up-to-date address data of your customers / contacts
  2. Easy and fast integration
  3. You can save the GladId additionally to the address data
  4. No risk for you, no additional effort
  5. Offer your customers something valuable

data.name: Why_Gladdress_Text
data.value:
Gladdress.com is your central online address management tool. Instead of notifying / changing every account of your online life, you change it once and everyone get to know it.

Create as many profiles as you like and specify the shared data-fields.

You have full control over your privacy!

Once set up, your gladid can be used in

  • Online Shops
  • Online Accounts
  • Your Friend's Address Books

data.name: Use_ExternalLogin
data.value: Use another service to log in

data.name: One_source_for_your_address_data
data.value: One source for your address data

data.name: RemoveExternalLoginProvider
data.value: Remove this {0} login from your account

data.name: Address_Name_Placeholder
data.value: Name of the Address e.g. Home / Work

data.name: Profile_Name_Placeholder
data.value: Name of the profile, e.g. E-Shops, Friends Contact, Social Media

data.name: MsgPasswortResetMailSent
data.value: You should have received am email from us

data.name: MsgPasswordChangedSuccess
data.value: Your Password has been changed successfully

data.name: PasswordMinLengthErrorMessage
data.value: The {0} must be at least {2} characters long.

data.name: PasswordsDoNotMatchErrorMessage
data.value: The new password and confirmation password do not match.

data.name: The_password_and_confirmation_password_do_not_match_
data.value: The password and confirmation password do not match.

data.name: The_new_password_and_confirmation_password_do_not_match_
data.value: The new password and confirmation password do not match.

data.name: Error_404_Text
data.value: The resource you requested could not be found!

data.name: Error_Error_Excuse
data.value: We are terribly, terribly sorry for this

data.name: Error_Error_Text
data.value: An error occurred while processing your request.

data.name: Help_Address_Overview
data.value: Here you can find all your addresses. Create as many as you like.

data.name: Help_Edit_Address
data.value: This section is about your address. Please fill in only fields you plan to use in a profile.

data.name: Help_Edit_Address_Overwrite_Fields
data.value: The following fields are the the same fields as you can find in personal data. This fields are address specific, if you want to use an address with a different name (e.g. a friend or relative that receives packages for you)

data.name: Help_Edit_Profile_Address_Data
data.value: Please select the fields from your "{0}" address, that you want to have included in this profile.

data.name: Help_Edit_Profile_GladId
data.value: The GladId is the unique identifier for this profile. Send it to whoever you want to have the data you selected in this profile. Anybody who has your GladId will be able to get your up-to-date data.

data.name: Help_Edit_Profile_Select_Fields_Personal_Data
data.value: Please pick the fields from your personal data, that you want to share with this profile.

data.name: Help_Profile_Overview
data.value: Here you can find all your profiles. A profile is a set of data-fields, that you share with online-shops, social networks and your friends. Create as many profiles as you like and choose the shared data-fields per profile.

data.name: Help_User_Data
data.value: This section is about you. Personal information that does not change, like your name and your email. Please fill in only the fields you want plan to use in a profile.

data.name: How_To_Use_Gladdress_Text
data.value:
Gladdress is incredibly simple to use.

  1. Login
  2. Enter personal data
  3. Enter Address(es)
  4. Create Profile(s)
  5. Share your GladId(s)

Once you are logged in, by creating a local account or by using any Single-Sign-On application like Facebook or Google, you can enter your personal data and create as many addresses as you have (e.g. Home, Workplace, friend's place, pick-up station).
Then you create a profile and specify the shared fields from the data you entered. You can create as many profiles as you like (e.g. online-shops, contact data for friends, social profile data).

data.name: MsgContactMailSent
data.value: Thank you for your message. We will get in touch with you soon!

data.name: Community_Text
data.value: Having a supportive community is worth gold! Gladdress brings a free service andit will alway stay free, in return

data.name: Community_Internationalization_Text
data.value:
I18n - or internationalization is a big topic when it comes to addresses. Gladdress is located in Switzerland and we need your help to make it available in all languages and be able to represent addresses all over the world.

There is a Github Repository where everyone can edit the resource files to make it possible.

data.name: Community_Source_code_Text
data.value:
Although the heart of gladdress is not open source (due to security reasons). We strongly support the open source phylosophy.

It's free and always will be

Do you want to be a part of it? If you really want to take hands on the source code, you can. Just ask! If you proof to be a good developer, we will enhance gladdress together with you!

data.name: Community_Field_discussions_Text
data.value: There is a Wiki on Github where we want to have discussions with you to identify address or profile fields we didn't think of. This way, we hope, gladdress will become the Swiss-Army-Knife in Address-Data-Management.

data.name: Community_Supported_Applications_Text
data.value:
Supported Applications are necessary for gladdress to work on the internet.

We are very happy to see that applications support the use of the GladId

Please let us know when your software supports gladdress so we can take it on the list

data.name: Community_Plugins_and_Extensions_Text
data.value:
With the free and easy to use API, developers can integrate Gladdress in their software solutions.

As for open-source projects, and there are many CMS and e-commerce solutions out there, we rely on the community to build plugins to ensure Gladdress support.

If you build a plugin and want to share it, please let us know. We can host it and / or further support it.

data.name: Tired_of_filling_out_forms_text
data.value:
Do it one last time!

For each profile you created, you will receive a GladId; a unique code that identifies your profile.

This GladId is what you enter in online-shops instead of your whole address data. This means that you have to provide only our GladId and the recipient is able to request your up-to-date contact data directly from gladdress.com.

Pretty simple eh?

data.name: MsgEmailChangedSuccess
data.value: Your account email has been changed
